hackathon-description-text: Welcome to VandyHacks IV - Vanderbilt University's annual collegiate hackathon! We welcome hackers of all skill levels and backgrounds to attend our event. Our official hacker guide can be found at

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Chief Data Officer, City of Nashville

hackathon-rules:
Every VandyHacks attendee must agree to abide by Major League Hacking's Code of Conduct, which can be found 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Nintendo Switch for each team member
Sennheiser 598 Headphones for each team member
$100 Amazon Gift Card for each team member
Chick-fil-A swag bags and Raspberry Pis for each team member
$50 Newegg Gift Card for each team member
Tile Mate for each team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: On-site interview with MicroStrategy and a ticket to an event in the Capital One Arena with access to MicroStrategy's suite, featuring unlimited food and drink for each team member
Amazon Echo for each team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Disruptive Hack, Courtesy of Red Ventures

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Nintendo Switch for each team member
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Fun Hack, Courtesy of The Home Depot

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $250 Amazon gift card for each team member
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Financial Hack, Courtesy of Capital One

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Free consultation, courtesy of Contrary Capital, for one amazing idea at VandyHacks IV

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2414 Highland Ave, Nashville, TN 37212, USA
hackathon-description-header: The first collegiate hackathon to call the rockin' city of Nashville, Tennessee home.
